weloveclouds.server.services

Class ReplicableDataAccessService

  • java.lang.Object
    • weloveclouds.server.services.DataAccessService
      • weloveclouds.server.services.MovableDataAccessService
        • weloveclouds.server.services.ReplicableDataAccessService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataAccessService, IMovableDataAccessService, IReplicableDataAccessService

    public class ReplicableDataAccessService
extends MovableDataAccessService
implements IReplicableDataAccessService
    An implementation of IReplicableDataAccessService whose underlying storage units can be replicated.
